Question
========
A one-way ANOVA is conducted. The Factor has four levels and the dependent variable is quantitative. We now want to construct the post-hoc Bonferroni confidence intervals. For these post-hoc Bonferroni confidence intervals, calculate the right-tail probability that belongs to the *t*-value.

Answerlist
----------
* 0.0042
* 0.0021
* 0.0063
* 0.013
